headline: Defense Contractors Stocks Q4 Earnings Review: Mercury Systems (NASDAQ:MRCY) Shines
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Mercury Systems (NASDAQ:MRCY) and the best and worst performers in the defense contractors industry.
